messages.message:
Got this all figured out! The steps we used are as follows:

1. Set up a crafting sandbox running on the frontend template (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/templates/frontend)
2. Tunnel into the crafting sandbox so that your laptop can reach nginx. Sandboxes created using the frontend template will be listening on port 8091. In my case, I configured crafting to use port 8015 locally
    ◦ `cs ssh -- -N -L8015:localhost:8091`
3. Copy the contents of `webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/cypress/configs/crafting-aihub.js` into a new file and replace the base URL with `http://localhost:8015`
    ◦ I named my config file `local-crafting-frontend.js`
4. Start cypress with your configurations
    ◦ `ENVIRONMENT=local-crafting-aihub yarn run e2e:open`
Thanks @mfichman!
